    • changeTransactionLimit

      public boolean changeTransactionLimit(int newTransactionLimit, String accountID)
      This method is used to change the transaction limit of the bank account
      Parameters:
      newTransactionLimit - The new transaction limit to change to for the user
      accountID - The accountID of the account
      Returns:
      True if transaction limit is changed successfully, false otherwise

    • updateAccount

      public boolean updateAccount(String accountID)
      This method is used to update the account information to the database
      Parameters:
      accountID - The accountID of the account to be updated
      Returns:
      True if connection to database and update successfully, false otherwise

    • retrieveAccountTransactions

      public ArrayList<Transaction> retrieveAccountTransactions()
      This method is used to retrieve the list of transactions for the account from the database
      Returns:
      Returns the list of transactions for the account from the database

    • GetAccountBalance

      public double GetAccountBalance()
      This method is used to calculate the balance of the account based off the transactions list
      Returns:
      Returns the balance calculated of the account else 0 if there are no transactions

    • GetWithDrawalsBalance

      public double GetWithDrawalsBalance() throws ParseException
      This method is get the total amount of withdrawals made today
      Returns:
      Returns the balance calculated of the account else 0 if there are no transactions
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • getTransactionAccount

      public List<Account> getTransactionAccount(String userID)
      This method is get the all accounts for the user from the database
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID of the user
      Returns:
      Returns the list of accounts for the user from the database

    • CheckAccountExist

      public boolean CheckAccountExist(String AccountID)
      This method is to check if account exist in database
      Parameters:
      AccountID - The userID of the user
      Returns:
      Returns false if account does not exist, true if account exist

    • createAccount

      public boolean createAccount(int selection, String userID)
      This method is used to create a new account type for the user
      Parameters:
      selection - The selection of the account type
      userID - The userID of the user
      Returns:
      Returns true if account is created successfully, false otherwise
